name: James Sauders
summary: Seasoned sales professional with 8+ years of retail and management experience, including AT&T, focused on customer service, sales targets, and leading high-performing teams. Known for initiative, reliability, problem-solving, and willingness to travel/work late to meet customer needs.

experience.title: Sales Representative; Sales Management
experience.description: Responsible for hitting various sales targets; ranked number one in store for the single year as a sales rep. Led wired sales, feature & accessory sales, and customer service scores. Won awards for exceeding customer service goals. Assisted in training new sales reps within three months of hire.

experience.title: Airman/Cryptologic Linguist
experience.description: Selected to run time scheduling/management/instruction over entry control procedures; dorm leader; handled sensitive data transfers; trained in Arabic and Russian; honorably/medically discharged.

experience.title: Technology Sales Rep / Technology Sales Lead / Technology Sales Manager
experience.description: Progressed from entry-level sales rep to tech sales lead and tech manager at Circuit City; consistently led in sales targets, customer service results, and extended warranty sales; trained and motivated sales reps; contributed to more than 14 months in the top ten company-wide for customer service results; multiple Sales Associate of the Month awards.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Political Science and History
Organizational Leadership & Learning (in progress; plan to MBA/HR)
